message: I'm excited to introduce you to this incredible product that I think you'll love. Would you be interested in taking a look?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Could you consider that?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $750000. How about we meet in the middle at $825000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $775000?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think the product is worth more than $775000. How about we try $810000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $795000?
I think we're getting close, but I still want to get the best price for the product. How about we try $820000?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm willing to make one more offer. How about we try $790000?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $790000. How about we meet in the middle one last time at $805000?
I've made it this far, I'm not giving up yet. How about we try $795000 one last time?
